description: A stylesheet defining CSS variables for theme management, styles for the App component, and responsive design elements for the tic-tac-toe application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with styles for layout, responsiveness, and theming.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button allowing users to switch between light and dark themes.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the App header that contains the main content.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the logo with animations applied in specific conditions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the App component.
